Numbers! is a simple pilot project launched by tech4lifeapps.

We specialize in developing educational tools for Android phones and tablets.

This free learning tool is dedicated to the children of ASEAN. Numbers! is free of any ads and does not use or rely on an Internet connection.

Please contact us if you'd like to support us with contributions in your own language. We would be happy to include your content in more sophisticated, future versions of this App.

Thank you!
